name: The Tale of the Extended Warranty
name_original: The Tale of the Extended Warranty
description:
The staff at the GREAT ELECTRONICS store has a new strategy to make more profit: mobilize all associates on one customer and never stop pushing for the extended warranty!

Can you defeat the sales people and leave with your laptop without extra charge?

Inspired by my experience as a salesman at an undisclosed electronics store, I present to you "The Tale of the Extended Warranty". Fight 3 waves of associates as well as 3 bosses in this retro twin-stick shooter inspired by Smash TV and Robotron.

Controls

The game is compatible with a gamepad. You need to enable it in the settings. It will deactivate the keyboard controls though. For keyboard, you can also use IJKL to shoot instead of the arrows.

Credits

  • Programming, art and design by SuperMegaDav
  • All songs have been composed by the excellent Jonpon
